name: Train Simulator: Trainload BR Class 60 Loco Add-On
summary: While they have a chequered career, one cannot deny the power that a Class 60 can put down on the rails; having earned the nickname "Tug" from enthusiasts as it's what they do best, and now you can put them to work on heavy freight duty. Experience the might of the BR Class 60 in Train Simulator!
